sent-hil.com: tmux a - tmux

➜ whoami
Senthil Arivudainambi
➜ cat about.txt

Hello! I am an experienced web developer and entrepreneur. My passion and strength lies in rapidly prototyping and validating new ideas through code. I'm currently a Senior AI Engineer @ Instrumentl, building an AI-assisted grant writing software, living in San Jose with my wife and very young son. I'm always interested in meeting smart people and learning about new technologies. Please reach out through Email or LinkedIn.

➜ ls work-history/
Instrumentl/ - Grant software for non profits
ToolWall/ - The first digital organizer for your physical tools
Walker-Company/ - Health and beauty products for people of color, acquired by P&G in 2018
Koding/ - Modern development environment, now shutdown
MajesticMedia/ - A design and development agency, acquired
TwitLens/ - Photosharing site for Twitter, also acquired
➜ cat skills.txt

These days I write Ruby and Python for work and fun. My current/past interests include AI, photography, woodworking, CNCs to name a few.

➜ ls open-source/
bitesized/ - Redis bitmap powered analytics in Go
runeio/ - Library that provides functions for manipulating runes in Go
planetbot/ - A bot that connects you to actions to help the environment
open_auth2/ - Thin OAuth2 wrapper written on top of Faraday in Ruby
sfsbook/ - A repository for the reduce violence against women in SF project in Ruby
caltrain-realtime/ - Realtime train timings for various train stations in both directions in Go
adler32/ - Just a small library for calculating adler32 checksum in Go
go-yamlconfig/ - Small library for parsing (ala Rails) yaml config files in Go
peak/ - Anomaly detection service for your metrics in Ruby
bitlang/ - Half finished programming language in Go
